Marketing Manager

GrowthBrand • New York, NY • Posted May 12, 2023
Marketing
Compensation: $90,000 - $110,000 per year

Description

GrowthBrand is seeking a Marketing Manager to lead our digital marketing efforts. You'll develop and execute marketing strategies to increase brand awareness and drive customer acquisition. The ideal candidate has experience in digital marketing, content strategy, and campaign management.
